mapper.insert: insert into menu (menu_idx, com_id, menu_name, menu_price, menu_describe, menu_img) values (null,#{com_id} ,#{menu.menu_name}, #{menu.menu_price}, #{menu.menu_describe}, #{menu.menu_img})
mapper.select: SELECT com_num FROM company WHERE com_num = #{com_num}
SELECT * FROM reservation WHERE com_id = #{com_id} AND res_date = CURDATE() ORDER BY res_time DESC
